message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair considering the inflation rates affect you more heavily than me, so you should accept early.
Let's split the amount equally at 50-50. This way, we both start off equally and fairly.

I'm offering a 55-45 split, which is more favorable to you than my first offer. Remember, with your 20% inflation rate per round, delaying will cost you much more than it costs me. This is a fair deal that benefits us both if we agree now.
I am willing to adjust slightly, proposing a 42-58 split in your favor. This maintains fairness while accounting for the inflation impact on me.
